text:
NATIONAL ASSOCIATION
OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
Alabama Educational TV Commitalon
807 Protective Lite Building
Birmingham, Alabama
March 11, 1959
Mr. Harry J. Skomla
Executive Director
N.A.E.B.
14 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illlnoli
Dear Harry:
It seems that Saturday, April 18, will suit our convenience
beat for a time to hold a Region 11 meeting, moat likely In
Atlanta. I would like to know Immediately If this will suit
yours and Bill Harley's schedule.
With kindest regards, I am
Sincerely yours,
RDH/ml
Raymond D. Huribert
